text: Tumhari auratein tumhari khetiyan hain, tumhein ikhtiyar hai jis tarah chaho apni kheti mein jao, magar apne mustaqbil ki fikr karo aur Allah ki narazi se bacho. Khoob jaan lo ke tumhein ek din ussey milna hai. Aur (aey Nabi)! Jo tumhari hidayaat ko maan lein unhein falaah o saadat ka musda (khushkhabri) suna do
